title: Burnt
description: The definition, ‘Burnt’ explains Kendall’s life and state of mind perfectly. Devil’s Spawn MC Princess Kendall Bethany Jacobs had been Burnt, her heart was set aflame and her world turned to... ashes.Just before turning 23, after 5 years of learning to live in a very different world from the one she had once believed she would, Kendall is thrown into a situation that will test, not only her but, the limits of love, endurance and faith.Declan Marks has coveted his best friend Kendall for almost 14 years. After altering their path as friends 5 years ago, and now, barely hanging on to a fraction of what they used to share, Declan will find himself facing yet another terrifying reality.Through, heartache, secrets, lies and unknown enemies, Kendall and Declan will need to prove their strength and devotion to overcome what seems like insurmountable odds.
author: Natasha Thomas
